meanings.definition: Leading or directing in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent1: The misguiding sign pointed us the opposite way.
meanings.sent2: Her misguiding advice led us astray.
meanings.sent3: The misguiding map made us walk in circles.
meanings.sent4: The misguiding compass confused our journey.
meanings.sent5: The misguiding instructions caused us to get lost.

meanings.sent1: The misguiding website provided incorrect details.
meanings.sent2: His misguiding statement led to confusion.
meanings.sent4: The misguiding advertisement tricked many people.
meanings.sent5: The misguiding data resulted in wrong conclusions.
